scripts.dev: npm run migrate && concurrently 'npm start --prefix frontend' 'npm run dev --prefix server'
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix blockchain && npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix blockchain && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix server
scripts.ganache: ganache-cli -m 'gauge pilot return sauce iron woman reason ridge across kangaroo sorry ritual'
